title: Scrolls
content: Scroll of Moonbean Call down a silvery beam of pale light. Any creature that enters the beam or starts its turn in the light, takes 2d10 Radiant Damage. On a successful save, targets still take half damage. You can use your action to move the beam 18m. Scroll of Goodberry Conjure four magical berries for youself or a companion.
